price: Na utawezaje kuvumilia yale usiyo yajua vilivyo undani wake?
arabic: وَكَيۡفَ تَصۡبِرُ عَلَىٰ مَا لَمۡ تُحِطۡ بِهِۦ خُبۡرٗا
footnotes: Na utawezaje kustahamilia jambo lisilo pata kukufika mfano wake?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wakayfa taṣbiru ʿalā mā lam tuḥiṭ bihi khub'ran
